questions.author: Dylan Stackhouse
questions.subject: Programming
questions.question: Why doesn't everyone user Ember.js?
questions.body: It just seems like such a fanstastic framework. It does things that usually take many components or modules and does it for you. It just works and I do not get why everyone doesn't use it.

questions.author: Starbucks Barista
questions.subject: Finance
questions.question: How can we make more money from the epicodus students?
questions.body: Epicodus students come to our shop in droves every day, almost as if they depend on us to be functining developers. I figure there has to be a way to make more of a profit from this situation. Any Ideas?

questions.author: Literally Everyone
questions.subject: Programming
questions.question: How do I vertically center something in CSS?
questions.body: I just got back from my multi-month trip to various tibetan monestaries to learn the secrets of horizontally centering something in CSS. However, I am still lost as to how to center vertically. I am beginning to lose hope. Someone please help...
